#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
 ll Get(ll a,ll b,ll c,ll n) {
     ll res=0;
     res+=(b/c)*n;b%=c;
     res+=(a/c)*n*(n-1)/2;a%=c;
     if (a*n+b<c) return res;
     else return res+Get(c,(a*n+b)%c,a,(a*n+b)/c);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    ll x,m,y,k,ans,P,i,z,Sum;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t>0)
    {
        t--;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&m);
        z=2;
        y=x+2*m-2;
        ans=0;
        k=(y-x)/z+1;P=1;
        for (i=1;i<=35;i++,P<<=1) {
            Sum=Get(z,x,P,k);
            if (Sum & 1) ans+=P;
        }
        if(ans==0)
        printf("BOB\n");
        else
            printf("ALICE\n");
    }
}
